snippet.title: LBP2 Adventure Trailer
snippet.description: LittleBigPlanet 2 isn't just about creating -- first and foremost, it's about fun in all its forms. So aside from all of those creative tools, there's a whole meaty Story Mode to explore. It's an epic adventure through time and space, featuring awesome gameplay types, cool new power-ups, and a quirky cast of new characters. And on top of all of that, up to four players can get involved for maximum multiplayer merriment!
